mapper.update: update tb_system_log set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operation = #{operation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=BIGINT}, method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, params = #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
